verses.verse: The <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H2332>Eve<s%> his <S%H802>wife.<s%> She <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and gave <S%H3205>birth<s%> to <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H7069>gotten<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s help."

<S%H3254>Again<s%> she gave <S%H3205>birth,<s%> to <S%H251>Cain<s%>'s brother <S%H1893>Abel.<s%> <S%H1893>Abel<s%> was a <S%H7462>keeper<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> but <S%H7014>Cain<s%> was a <S%H5647>tiller<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>
As <S%H3117>time<s%> <S%H7093>passed,<s%> it happened that <S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

<S%H1893>Abel<s%> also <S%H935>brought<s%> some of the <S%H1062>firstborn<s%> of his <S%H6629>flock<s%> and of its <S%H2459>fat.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8159>respected<s%> <S%H1893>Abel<s%> and his <S%H4503>offering,<s%>
but he <S%H7014>didn't<s%> respect Cain and his <S%H4503>offering.<s%> <S%H7014>Cain<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry,<s%> and the expression on his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H5307>fell.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> "Why are you <S%H2734>angry?<s%> Why has the expression of your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H5307>fallen?<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> you do <S%H3190>well,<s%> will it not be <S%H7613>lifted<s%> <S%H3190>up?<s%> If you don't do well, <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H7257>crouches<s%> at the <S%H6607>door.<s%> Its <S%H8669>desire<s%> is for <S%H4910>you,<s%> but you are to rule over it."

<S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1893>Abel,<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H7704>"Let<s%>'s go into the field." It happened when they were in the field, that <S%H7014>Cain<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1893>Abel,<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and killed <S%H2026>him.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> <S%H335>"Where<s%> is <S%H1893>Abel,<s%> your <S%H251>brother?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H3045>don't<s%> know. Am I my <S%H251>brother<s%>'s keeper?"
Yahweh <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> have you <S%H6213>done?<s%> The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H6817>cries<s%> to me from the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

Now you are <S%H779>cursed<s%> because of the <S%H127>ground,<s%> which has <S%H6475>opened<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H1818>blood<s%> from your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

From now <S%H3588>on,<s%> when you <S%H5647>till<s%> the <S%H127>ground,<s%> it <S%H3254>won't<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> its <S%H3581>strength<s%> to <S%H5128>you.<s%> You shall be a fugitive and a <S%H5110>wanderer<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>"
<S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "My <S%H5771>punishment<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> than I can <S%H5375>bear.<s%>

<S%H1644>Behold,<s%> you have driven me out this <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H5641>ground.<s%> I will be hidden <S%H5921>from<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> and I will be a <S%H5128>fugitive<s%> and a <S%H5110>wanderer<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%> It will <S%H1961>happen<s%> that whoever finds <S%H4672>me<s%> will kill <S%H2026>me.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3651>him,<s%> "Therefore whoever <S%H2026>slays<s%> <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> vengeance will be <S%H5358>taken<s%> on him <S%H7659>sevenfold.<s%>" <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7760>appointed<s%> a <S%H226>sign<s%> for <S%H7014>Cain,<s%> <S%H1115>lest<s%> any <S%H4672>finding<s%> him should strike <S%H5221>him.<s%>
<S%H7014>Cain<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6440>presence,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5113>Nod,<s%> <S%H6926>east<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden.<s%>

<S%H7014>Cain<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> his <S%H802>wife.<s%> She <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and gave <S%H3205>birth<s%> to <S%H2585>Enoch.<s%> He <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> after the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H2585>Enoch.<s%>

To <S%H2585>Enoch<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H5897>Irad.<s%> <S%H5897>Irad<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the father of <S%H4232>Mehujael.<s%> <S%H4232>Mehujael<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the father of <S%H4967>Methushael.<s%> <S%H4967>Methushael<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the father of <S%H3929>Lamech.<s%>

<S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives:<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H5711>Adah,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6741>Zillah.<s%>
<S%H5711>Adah<s%> gave <S%H3205>birth<s%> to <S%H2989>Jabal,<s%> who was the <S%H1>father<s%> of those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%> and have <S%H4735>livestock.<s%>
His <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3106>Jubal,<s%> who was the <S%H1>father<s%> of all who <S%H8610>handle<s%> the <S%H3658>harp<s%> and <S%H5748>pipe.<s%>

<S%H6741>Zillah<s%> also gave <S%H3205>birth<s%> to <S%H8423>Tubal<s%> <S%H3913>Cain,<s%> the forger of every cutting <S%H2794>instrument<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron.<s%> <S%H8423>Tubal<s%> <S%H269>Cain<s%>'s sister was <S%H5279>Naamah.<s%>

<S%H3929>Lamech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H5711>"Adah<s%> and <S%H6741>Zillah,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%> You <S%H802>wives<s%> of <S%H3929>Lamech,<s%> <S%H238>listen<s%> to my <S%H565>speech,<s%> for I have <S%H2026>slain<s%> a <S%H3206>man<s%> for <S%H6482>wounding<s%> <S%H3206>me,<s%> a young man for bruising <S%H2250>me.<s%>
<S%H3588>If<s%> <S%H7014>Cain<s%> will be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> <S%H7659>seven<s%> <S%H3929>times,<s%> truly Lamech <S%H7657>seventy-seven<s%> <S%H7651>times.<s%>"

<S%H120>Adam<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5750>again.<s%> She gave <S%H3205>birth<s%> to a <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7121>and<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> him <S%H8352>Seth,<s%> "for <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H7896>appointed<s%> me <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H2233>child<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H1893>Abel,<s%> for <S%H7014>Cain<s%> killed <S%H2026>him.<s%>"

There was also <S%H3205>born<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H8352>Seth,<s%> and he <S%H8034>named<s%> him <S%H583>Enosh.<s%> Then <S%H2490>men<s%> began to <S%H7121>call<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H8034>name.<s%>
